author: felixweber
title: Cross Chain Cyber Security Collab
description: Spam & Scam attacks are an enormous thread for all DLT/Blockcain communities. Several Communities work on solutions. how can we collaborate
solution: Exploring a cross chain environment where DLT/Blockchain communities share common experiences and start to build solutions together.
experience: Highly engaged and experienced Cardano & Catalyst Community Projects, Cardano Ambassadors well connected to other Blockchain Communities
